committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to carry out conservation programs on military reservations and public lands for fiscal years 1989 through 1993.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for FY 1989 through 1993 to: (1) the Secretary of Defense for natural resources and fish and wildlife management on military reservations; (2) the Secretary of the Interior for cooperative plans for enhancement of fish and wildlife habitat and development of public recreation facilities on military reservations; (3) the Secretary of the Interior for data collection and conservation programs on public lands; and (4) the Secretary of Agriculture for fish, wildlife, and plant conservation and rehabilitation programs.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations to carry out conservation programs on military reservations and public lands for fiscal years 1989 through 1993.
